name: goyo balaclava
notes:
**size**	
one size

**needles**	
circular needle 4 mm [us 6] / 60cm [24”] for stitch pattern and to obtain gauge.
circular needle 3 mm [us2.5] / 60cm [24”] for ribbing

yarn	
dk weight yarn or fingering weight and lace weight yarn held together.

**gauge**	
20 stitches / 30 rows = 10 x 10 cm (4” x 4”) in stockinette stitch (after blocking)

**materiales**	
stitch marker, tapestry needle, cable needle(optional)


> den gratis goyo balaclava-opskrift kan
> fås på dansk her:
> https://strikkeglad.dk/55123/goyo-balaclava
